model.description: This is the model for process encoding, version 4.0 This version contains major changes, such as: - informations related to new WKF editor - roles are now stored in workflow and disappear from process model - deadlines have disappeared

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.FlexoModelObject

property.name: userIdentifier
property.description: Unique ID of the user (used for team synchronization)

property.name: flexoID
property.description: Unique ID generated and maintained by Flexo

property.name: dontGenerate
property.description: Check this box, if you don't want this node to generate documentation

property.name: hasSpecificDescriptions
property.description: Wheter the specific descriptions should be used in the generated documentation or not

property.name: specificDescriptions
property.description: Hashtable(String,String) that contains a name of a DocType as a key, and a description specific to that DocType as the value

property.name: dynamicProperties
property.description: Hashtable(String,String) that contains dynamic properties (data that are not handled by application, but need to be stored in the context of back compatibility)

entity.description: Root class for all objects of Flexo

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.RepresentableFlexoModelObject
entity.description: Contains data used for graphical representations

property.name: graphicalProperties
property.description: Dynamic properties storing data used for graphical representation

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.wkf.WKFObject
entity.description: Root class for all objects coding a FlexoProcess

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.wkf.FlexoProcess
entity.description: This represents a Flexo process or sub-process. Contains data describing the process and an ACTIVITY-levelled Petri-Graph

property.name: isWebService
property.description: Flag indicating wether this process is a WebService

property.name: lastUpdate
property.description: Last update date of this object. Used for optimistic dependancy checking.
